official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to place Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, Guam, and the Northern Mariana Islands on the same basis as States for the purpose of payment under the medicaid program.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) and part A (General Provisions) of title XI of the Social Security Act to place Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, Guam, and the Northern Mariana Islands on the same basis as States in regard to payment under the Medicaid program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to place Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, Guam, and the Northern Mariana Islands on the same basis as States for the purpose of payment under the medicaid program.
